module.name: specification_control
module.keywords: module, diversity, diversity management, product variant, product family
module.purpose:
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of products with a large number of variants. This application module provides a Unit of Functionality for application protocols.
This application module defines UOF S7 of ISO 10303-236.

inscope.li: product classes used to identify sets of similar products to be offered to the market;
specifications used to describe characteristics of the products;
specification categories used to group similar characteristics of the products;
specification expressions used to control the usage of a part within a product and to represent conditions for product classes;
product functions used to describe the functional requirements for products and components of products;
product components used to describe the common decomposition structure of all products of a product class or of various alternative solutions;
alternative solutions used to describe the variants for a product component or for a product function;
item instances used to identify an occurrence of a component in an assembly structure, e.g., to identify the elements of an alternative solution;
configurations used to link the parts (item instances), alternative solutions, product components, or product functions with their usage cases, i.e., the conditions under which they are used;
product specifications are used to identify a manufacturable product out of a product class by its specific characteristics (specifications), e.g., a customer order for a car;
